column5: well ive been reading a lot about bass fishing and stuff.. ive never really been "very" knowledgeable on their  behavior, im going fishing on white lake next week. considering the temperature is going to be rising or stable from what it is now. do you think i wont get a lot of topwater  action?, at least not during mid day. dropshotting and jigging 10-20 feet of water would be my best bet? thanks ahead of time
